attributes.action: encourage Cadburys to make Giant Creme Eggs for Easter 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Im creating this petition, becase I believe there is more people out there who love Cadburys Creme Eggs, as much as i do, and I would like Cadburys to make BIG creme eggs for Easter.

If you to want this to happen then sign this petition and ask all of your friends to join to and hopefully Cadburys will listen to us, and make BIG creme eggs for Easter 2010.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
